data.title: Oconee Fall Line Technical College
data.text:
Oconee Fall Line Technical College (OFTC) is located in Sandersville, Georgia. OFTC is part of the Technical College System of Georgia. It was established back in 2011 in an effort to provide students in the area with a cost-effective technical college to meet their needs. The school serves the community by offering many courses that can help people to walk new career paths. There are many business and industry services programs as well as credit programs of study. Students will be able to take courses such as medical assisting, accounting, electronics technology, pharmacy technology, and much more.

OFTC has a number of different nursing programs that can help students to find well paying new careers. Students can take practical nursing courses, associateâ€™s degree nursing courses, LPN-to-RN bridge courses. This is a very practical and cost-effective school for students who wish to become LPNs or RNs. The curriculum is very effective at helping students to realize their full potential as nurses. All students will be able to gain the necessary skills to find great success as nurses. The success rate of nursing courses at this technical college is quite high as well.
